title: Tesla pay package that helped make Elon Musk the world’s richest person was unfair, judge rules
description: The ruling by a Delaware court stems from a Tesla shareholder lawsuit over the tech billionaire’s 2018 compensation package.

title: Elmo asked how everyone’s doing and, um, they’re not great!
description: Elmo is trending on X after it wrote, “Elmo is just checking in. How is everybody doing?” Celebrities and everyday people replied that the world was on fire. Sesame posted mental health resources.

title: We read all the Vision Pro reviews so you don’t have to
description: The first impressions: It’s the best high-definition TV set you can imagine. But it’s also an imperfect, $3,500 computer you wear on your face.

title: Meta says its parental controls protect kids. But hardly anyone uses them.
description: Internal Meta safety experts have raised red flags about the features, citing infrequent use, low adoption and high burdens on parents.

title: Apple’s Vision Pro is nearly here. But what can you do with it?
description: Could a $3,499 headset replace your computer? Here are three things you may want to use one for, and three things it’s not great for.

title: Apple’s Vision Pro is the most data-hungry gadget I’ve ever seen
description: The Vision Pro, arriving Friday, brings us a whole new dimension of privacy risks. Apple appears to have only partial solutions.
